text: int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- > 0 ) { int n , i ; long long int sum = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; long long int a [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%lld" , & a [ i ] ) ; } int d [ n ] ; d [ n - 1 ] = 0 ; for ( i = n - 2 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) { if ( a [ i ] <= a [ i + 1 ] ) { d [ i ] = d [ i + 1 ] + 1 ; } else { d [ i ] = d [ i + 1 ] ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , d [ 0 ] + n ) ; } return 0 ; }
